column4: hello guys. just installed ubuntu on my lappy. ive not used ubuntu before, i run fc3 on my desktop pc. how can i install nfs-utils on the laptop? apt-get install nfs-utils says no matching packages
try to find out package by apt-cache search nfs command
im not familiar with the apt commands
i tried apt-get search nfs ,, lol
its the tools i want to use to mount an nfs directory
im sharing my music from my linux desktop to the lappy
u even find out what u need by apt-cache search <keyword> , keyword is not exactly package name
when i hear what chet has to say heh
yes, chet is right, I think nfs-common is what u need
i just got a lappy off my mate, didnt even boot win2k, ubuntu went straight on
